attributes.action: Investigate whether there are detrimental health effects of the fire at Newport
attributes.additional_details:
South Wales Wood Recycling Ltd depot at the Alexandra Docks started after a stockpile of about 40,000 tonnes of wood chippings were set alight on November 16.
It is now December 17th 2015.
attributes.background:
Investigate why the fire is still smoking after nearly a month and is it harmful to the public health? The public have been complaining of chest and breathing issues along with headaches.
National Resource Wales and Newport City Council are failing the people of Newport City.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with local councillors. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
